quiz.question: sleet _____
quiz.explanation: 雨夹雪, 雨夹雪风暴. A dangerous sleet storm closed the highways. 危险的雨夹雪风暴关闭了高速公路。

quiz.question: tuffet ____
quiz.explanation: 小圆凳, 小圆凳座位. Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet eating her curds. 小玛菲特小姐坐在小圆凳上吃凝乳。

quiz.question: fidget _________
quiz.explanation: 坐立不安, 紧张地坐立不安. The student would fidget nervously during the exam. 学生在考试期间会紧张地坐立不安。

quiz.question: ricochet ______
quiz.explanation: 跳飞, 跳飞的子弹. The ricochet bullet struck an innocent bystander. 跳飞的子弹击中了无辜的旁观者。

quiz.question: hatchet ___
quiz.explanation: 短柄斧, 恶意攻击. The newspaper did a hatchet job on the politician. 报纸对政客进行了恶意攻击。

quiz.question: disquiet ____
quiz.explanation: 不安, 不安的心灵. A growing sense of disquiet filled her mind. 越来越强的不安感充满了她的心灵。

quiz.question: straitjacket ___________
quiz.explanation: 紧身衣, 紧身衣束缚. The patient was placed in straitjacket confinement. 病人被置于紧身衣束缚中。

quiz.question: ______ racket
quiz.explanation: 球拍, 网球球拍. She gripped her tennis racket tightly before serving. 她在发球前紧紧握住网球球拍。

quiz.question: _____ thicket
quiz.explanation: 灌木丛, 茂密的灌木丛. The rabbit hid in the dense thicket of bushes. 兔子藏在茂密的灌木丛中。

quiz.question: ____ locket
quiz.explanation: 小盒坠, 金小盒坠. She wore a gold locket containing her mother's picture. 她戴着一个装有母亲照片的金小盒坠。

quiz.question: _______ casket
quiz.explanation: 棺材, 葬礼棺材. The funeral casket was carried by six pallbearers. 葬礼棺材由六名抬棺者抬着。

quiz.question: ______ doublet
quiz.explanation: 紧身上衣, 天鹅绒紧身上衣. The Renaissance gentleman wore a velvet doublet. 文艺复兴时期的绅士穿着天鹅绒紧身上衣。

quiz.question: _____ ringlet
quiz.explanation: 卷发, 卷曲的卷发. The little girl had beautiful curly ringlets. 小女孩有美丽的卷曲卷发。

quiz.question: _________ pamphlet
quiz.explanation: 小册子, 政治小册子. Protesters distributed political pamphlets on the street. 抗议者在街上分发政治小册子。

quiz.question: ______ mallet
quiz.explanation: 木槌, 木制木槌. The carpenter used a wooden mallet to tap the chisel. 木匠用木制木槌敲凿子。

quiz.question: ____ pellet
quiz.explanation: 小球, 铅小球. The air rifle fired small lead pellets. 气步枪发射小铅弹。

quiz.question: ____ droplet
quiz.explanation: 小滴, 雨滴. Tiny rain droplets sparkled on the spider web. 微小的雨滴在蜘蛛网上闪闪发光。

quiz.question: _____ amulet
quiz.explanation: 护身符, 幸运护身符. She wore a lucky amulet for protection. 她戴着幸运护身符以求保护。

quiz.question: plummet ____
quiz.explanation: 急剧下降, 急剧下降. Stock prices began to plummet down rapidly. 股价开始急剧下降。

quiz.question: ___ bonnet
quiz.explanation: 引擎盖, 汽车引擎盖. He lifted the car bonnet to check the engine. 他抬起汽车引擎盖检查发动机。

quiz.question: _____ hornet
quiz.explanation: 大黄蜂, 蜇人的大黄蜂. A sting from a hornet can be very painful. 大黄蜂的蜇可能非常疼痛。

quiz.question: _____ parapet
quiz.explanation: 护墙, 石护墙. Soldiers stood guard along the stone parapet. 士兵沿着石护墙站岗。

quiz.question: ___ crumpet
quiz.explanation: 烤饼, 茶点烤饼. She served buttered crumpets with afternoon tea. 她在下午茶时供应涂黄油的烤饼。

quiz.question: fret _____
quiz.explanation: 烦恼, 为...烦恼. Don't fret about things you cannot change. 不要为你无法改变的事情烦恼。

quiz.question: ___ ferret
quiz.explanation: 雪貂, 宠物雪貂. The children adored their playful pet ferret. 孩子们喜爱他们顽皮的宠物雪貂。

quiz.question: ______ turret
quiz.explanation: 角楼, 城堡角楼. Archers defended from the castle turret. 弓箭手从城堡角楼防守。

quiz.question: thickset ___
quiz.explanation: 粗壮的, 粗壮的男人. The thickset man had a powerful build. 这个粗壮的男人有强壮的体格。

quiz.question: basset _____
quiz.explanation: 矮腿猎犬, 巴塞特猎犬. The basset hound had long droopy ears. 巴塞特猎犬有长长的下垂耳朵。

quiz.question: __ ___ outset
quiz.explanation: 开始, 在开始. We knew at the outset this would be difficult. 我们在开始时就知道这会很困难。

quiz.question: _____ rivet
quiz.explanation: 铆钉, 金属铆钉. Metal rivets held the steel plates together. 金属铆钉将钢板固定在一起。

quiz.question: waft __ _______
quiz.explanation: 飘, 香水的飘. A gentle waft of perfume filled the room. 一股温和的香水飘满了房间。

quiz.question: heft ______
quiz.explanation: 重量, 掂重量. He tested the heft and weight of the hammer. 他测试了锤子的重量。

quiz.question: makeshift _______
quiz.explanation: 临时的, 临时的庇护所. Refugees built makeshift shelters from whatever they found. 难民用找到的任何东西建造临时庇护所。

quiz.question: _________ uplift
quiz.explanation: 振奋, 情感振奋. The inspiring speech gave everyone emotional uplift. 鼓舞人心的演讲给每个人带来了情感振奋。

quiz.question: ___ aloft
quiz.explanation: 在高处, 在高处飞. Eagles soar aloft on thermal currents. 老鹰在热气流上在高处翱翔。

quiz.question: _____ tuft
quiz.explanation: 簇, 草簇. A small grass tuft grew between the stones. 一小簇草在石头之间生长。

quiz.question: _____ alight
quiz.explanation: 着火, 房子着火. The house was alight with flames. 房子着火了。

quiz.question: ____ ____ limelight
quiz.explanation: 聚光灯, 进入聚光灯. The shy actress reluctantly stepped into the limelight. 害羞的女演员不情愿地进入聚光灯下。

quiz.question: searchlight ____
quiz.explanation: 探照灯, 探照灯光束. The searchlight beam swept across the night sky. 探照灯光束扫过夜空。

quiz.question: ___ plight
quiz.explanation: 困境, 悲惨的困境. The refugees' sad plight moved many to donate. 难民的悲惨困境感动了许多人捐款。

quiz.question: ___ _____ fortnight
quiz.explanation: 两周, 两周. A fortnight is exactly two weeks. 两周正好是十四天。

quiz.question: _____ fright
quiz.explanation: 惊吓, 孩子惊吓. The child got a fright from the loud noise. 孩子被响亮的噪音吓了一跳。

quiz.question: downright ___
quiz.explanation: 彻底的, 彻底的谎言. That statement was a downright lie. 那个陈述是彻底的谎言。

quiz.question: uptight ______
quiz.explanation: 紧张的, 紧张的父母. The uptight parent worried about everything. 紧张的父母担心一切。

quiz.question: aught __ _____
quiz.explanation: 任何, 任何有价值的. He owned naught of value in the world. 他在世上没有拥有任何有价值的东西。

quiz.question: ____ __ naught
quiz.explanation: 化为乌有, 化为乌有. All their efforts came to naught. 他们所有的努力都化为乌有。

quiz.question: ____ draught
quiz.explanation: 生啤, 生啤酒. He ordered a cold beer on draught. 他点了一杯冰冷的生啤酒。

quiz.question: distraught ______
quiz.explanation: 心烦意乱的, 心烦意乱的母亲. The distraught mother searched for her lost child. 心烦意乱的母亲寻找她失踪的孩子。

quiz.question: afterthought ______
quiz.explanation: 事后想法, 事后想法借口. His apology seemed like an afterthought excuse. 他的道歉似乎是事后想法的借口。

quiz.question: nought _____
quiz.explanation: 零, 零点. The score was nought point five. 分数是零点五。

quiz.question: overwrought ______
quiz.explanation: 过度紧张的, 过度紧张的神经. Her overwrought nerves caused anxiety attacks. 她过度紧张的神经导致焦虑发作。

quiz.question: _____ plait
quiz.explanation: 辫子, 编辫子. She wore her hair in a long braid plait. 她把头发编成长辫子。

quiz.question: discredit _______
quiz.explanation: 使失信, 使证人失信. The lawyer tried to discredit the witness. 律师试图使证人失信。

quiz.question: forfeit ____
quiz.explanation: 丧失, 丧失比赛. The team had to forfeit the game due to absences. 球队因缺席不得不丧失比赛。

quiz.question: discomfit _____
quiz.explanation: 使困惑, 使敌人困惑. The surprise attack would discomfit the enemy. 突然袭击会使敌人困惑。

quiz.question: _____ git
quiz.explanation: 傻瓜, 愚蠢的傻瓜. That silly git made another stupid mistake. 那个愚蠢的傻瓜又犯了一个愚蠢的错误。

quiz.question: floodlit _______
quiz.explanation: 泛光照明的, 泛光照明的体育场. The floodlit stadium hosted evening matches. 泛光照明的体育场举办晚间比赛。

quiz.question: flit _____
quiz.explanation: 掠过, 掠过. Butterflies would flit about the garden flowers. 蝴蝶会在花园的花朵间掠过。

quiz.question: sunlit ______
quiz.explanation: 阳光照耀的, 阳光照耀的山谷. The sunlit valley looked peaceful and beautiful. 阳光照耀的山谷看起来宁静美丽。

quiz.question: lamplit ______
quiz.explanation: 灯火通明的, 灯火通明的街道. Victorian lamplit streets had a romantic atmosphere. 维多利亚时代灯火通明的街道有浪漫的氛围。

quiz.question: ____ slit
quiz.explanation: 狭缝, 微小的狭缝. A tiny slit in the curtain let light through. 窗帘上的微小狭缝让光透过。

quiz.question: vomit _____
quiz.explanation: 呕吐, 呕吐血. The sick patient began to vomit blood. 生病的病人开始呕吐血。

quiz.question: ______ armpit
quiz.explanation: 腋窝, 出汗的腋窝. His sweaty armpits stained his shirt. 他出汗的腋窝弄脏了衬衫。

quiz.question: spit ___
quiz.explanation: 吐出, 吐出. He had to spit out the bitter medicine. 他不得不吐出苦药。

quiz.question: ____ grit
quiz.explanation: 勇气, 真正的勇气. The athlete showed true grit in finishing the race. 运动员在完成比赛中展现了真正的勇气。

quiz.question: dispirit _______
quiz.explanation: 使沮丧, 使工人沮丧. The bad news would dispirit the workers. 坏消息会使工人沮丧。

quiz.question: ________ culprit
quiz.explanation: 罪犯, 刑事罪犯. Police arrested the criminal culprit quickly. 警方迅速逮捕了刑事罪犯。

quiz.question: acquit _________
quiz.explanation: 宣判无罪, 宣判被告无罪. The jury voted to acquit the defendant. 陪审团投票宣判被告无罪。

quiz.question: outwit ________
quiz.explanation: 智胜, 智胜对手. The clever detective managed to outwit his opponent. 聪明的侦探成功智胜了对手。

quiz.question: pelt __ ____
quiz.explanation: 投掷, 雨的倾泻. A heavy pelt of rain hammered the roof. 大雨倾泻在屋顶上。

quiz.question: welt ____
quiz.explanation: 伤痕, 伤痕标记. A red welt mark appeared where he was struck. 他被击打的地方出现了红色的伤痕标记。

quiz.question: _____ hilt
quiz.explanation: 剑柄, 剑剑柄. The knight gripped the sword hilt firmly. 骑士紧紧握住剑柄。

quiz.question: ________ kilt
quiz.explanation: 苏格兰短裙, 苏格兰苏格兰短裙. The bagpiper wore a traditional Scottish kilt. 风笛手穿着传统的苏格兰短裙。

quiz.question: ____-____ lilt
quiz.explanation: 轻快的节奏, 抑扬顿挫的轻快节奏. Her voice had a pleasant sing-song lilt. 她的声音有愉快的抑扬顿挫轻快节奏。

quiz.question: ____ spilt
quiz.explanation: 溢出, 牛奶溢出. No use crying over spilt milk. 为溢出的牛奶哭泣没有用。

quiz.question: _____ silt
quiz.explanation: 淤泥, 河流淤泥. River silt accumulated at the delta. 河流淤泥在三角洲堆积。

quiz.question: inbuilt _______
quiz.explanation: 内置的, 内置的功能. The phone has an inbuilt camera feature. 这部手机有内置的相机功能。

quiz.question: wilted ______
quiz.explanation: 枯萎, 枯萎的花. The wilted flowers needed water desperately. 枯萎的花迫切需要水。

quiz.question: unbolt ____
quiz.explanation: 拔开门闩, 拔开门门闩. He had to unbolt the heavy door to enter. 他必须拔开沉重的门门闩才能进入。

quiz.question: thunderbolt ______
quiz.explanation: 霹雳, 霹雳打击. A thunderbolt strike lit up the sky. 霹雳打击照亮了天空。

quiz.question: ______ dolt
quiz.explanation: 笨蛋, 愚蠢的笨蛋. That stupid dolt couldn't follow simple instructions. 那个愚蠢的笨蛋无法遵循简单的指示。

quiz.question: _____ jolt
quiz.explanation: 震动, 剧烈的震动. A sharp jolt woke him from his sleep. 剧烈的震动把他从睡梦中惊醒。

quiz.question: _____ molt
quiz.explanation: 蜕皮, 蛇蜕皮. Snakes molt their skin several times yearly. 蛇每年蜕皮几次。

quiz.question: __________ somersault
quiz.explanation: 翻筋斗, 体操翻筋斗. The gymnast performed a perfect somersault. 体操运动员完成了完美的翻筋斗。

quiz.question: tumult _____
quiz.explanation: 骚动, 人群骚动. The tumult of the crowd was deafening. 人群的骚动震耳欲聋。

quiz.question: discordant ____
quiz.explanation: 不和谐的, 不和谐的音符. A discordant note ruined the harmony. 一个不和谐的音符破坏了和谐。

quiz.question: __ leant
quiz.explanation: 倚靠, 他倚靠. He leant against the wall tiredly. 他疲倦地倚靠在墙上。

quiz.question: ____ miscreant
quiz.explanation: 恶棍, 卑鄙的恶棍. The vile miscreant was finally captured. 卑鄙的恶棍最终被捕获。

quiz.question: extravagant _________
quiz.explanation: 奢侈的, 奢侈的生活方式. The celebrity led an extravagant lifestyle. 这位名人过着奢侈的生活方式。

quiz.question: chant ____
quiz.explanation: 吟唱, 吟唱赞美诗. Monks would chant hymns in the monastery. 僧侣们会在修道院吟唱赞美诗。

quiz.question: triumphant ______
quiz.explanation: 胜利的, 胜利的归来. The hero made a triumphant return home. 英雄凯旋归来。

quiz.question: defiant _____
quiz.explanation: 反抗的, 反抗的孩子. The defiant child refused to obey. 反抗的孩子拒绝服从。

quiz.question: gallant ______
quiz.explanation: 英勇的, 英勇的骑士. The gallant knight rescued the princess. 英勇的骑士拯救了公主。

quiz.question: slant _____
quiz.explanation: 斜, 斜韵. The poet used slant rhyme for effect. 诗人使用斜韵来达到效果。

quiz.question: stimulant ____
quiz.explanation: 兴奋剂, 兴奋剂药物. Caffeine is a common stimulant drug. 咖啡因是一种常见的兴奋剂药物。

quiz.question: adamant ______
quiz.explanation: 坚定的, 坚定的立场. He maintained an adamant stance on the issue. 他在这个问题上保持坚定的立场。

quiz.question: ______ informant
quiz.explanation: 告密者, 警方告密者. The police informant provided crucial information. 警方告密者提供了关键信息。

quiz.question: indignant _______
quiz.explanation: 愤慨的, 愤慨的抗议. The workers staged an indignant protest. 工人们进行了愤慨的抗议。

quiz.question: _____ remnant
quiz.explanation: 残余, 小残余. Only a small remnant of the army survived. 只有一小部分军队幸存。

quiz.question: protuberant _____
quiz.explanation: 突出的, 突出的肚子. The man had a large protuberant belly. 这个男人有一个大的突出肚子。
